item.description:
Here are the retreat details:

-- WHEN/WHERE: Thursday, October 11, 2012 at 4.p.m. through Sunday, October 14, 2012 at 1 p.m. at Cape Cod Sea Camps, 3057 Main St. (Route 6A), Brewster, MA 02631.

-- MORE WHERE: Most of our activities will be in the camp's beautiful Art Center, which is near the front of the camp, close to the parking lots and Route 6A.

-- OPENING SESSION: Our opening meeting will begin at 6 p.m. in the Art Center. Pizza will be served. Then we'll swing right into the retreat activities. More details to come.

-- SPECIAL ATC SWAP: We'll be doing a special ATC swap on the retreat theme. Everyone's invited to participate in this optional activity, whether or not you're attending the retreat. Details are on the Message Board.

--T-SHIRTS: Tam is taking orders for T-shirts bearing Pat's beautiful design. Details on ordering are here. UPDATE: All T-shirts have arrived and will be available for pickup during and after the retreat.

-- The retreat schedule, a "what-to-bring" list and other details have all been e-mailed. Most of the same info is on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: Head for the Art Center (see link to picture below)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Retreat 2012!
